macro.name: OFFSET_X
macro.description: X component of measured field offset

macro.name: OFFSET_Y
macro.description: Y component of measured field offset

macro.name: OFFSET_Z
macro.description: Z component of measured field offset

macro.name: DAQ_NAME
macro.description: Port name for AI DAQ Port. Defaults to cDAQ9185-MUONFEMod3
